name: In and Out of a Psych Ward
name_original: In and Out of a Psych Ward
description:
Social Justice Game Jam Submission

Title: In and Out of a Psych Ward

Law in question: WA RAC 71.05.050

Description: This game is about my experience voluntary going into a psych ward and how I tried to get out. Upon admitting myself, I was given my patient rights which indicated that as a voluntary patient, I was allowed to leave whenever I wanted. This was not necessarily the case as there was a lot of legal barriers holding me back. I did admit myself for help, but the actual stay was more detrimental to my mental health than having just stayed home.
